tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SurveyResponses (
  participant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR,
  profession VARCHAR,
  education_level VARCHAR,
  response_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE survey_responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    participant_id INT,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50),
    survey_date DATE,
    completed BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE research_studies (
    study_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    study_name VARCHAR(100),
    researcher_id INT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    ethics_approval BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE researchers_survey_responses (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    researcher_id INT,
    participant_id INT,
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    response TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE participants (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(50),
    age INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    ethnicity VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Responses (
 response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 participant_id INT,
 survey_id INT,
 response_text TEXT,
 FOREIGN KEY (participant_id) REFERENCES Participants(participant_id),
 FOREIGN KEY (survey_id) REFERENCES Surveys(survey_id)
);
CREATE TABLE researchers (id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(100));
CREATE TABLE studies (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title VARCHAR(50), description TEXT, researcher_id INT REFERENCES researchers(id));
CREATE TABLE participants (id INT PRIMARY KEY, age INT, gender VARCHAR(10), study_id INT REFERENCES studies(id));
CREATE TABLE survey_responses (id INT PRIMARY KEY, participant_id INT REFERENCES participants(id), question TEXT, answer TEXT);
CREATE TABLE ethics_approvals (id INT PRIMARY KEY, study_id INT REFERENCES studies(id), approved_at TIMESTAMP);
